a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Reported share of people experiencing homelessness who are women,
The data is collected at a single point in time, by counting the people living on the street or staying in shelters on one night of
the year. Countries use different definitions and data collection methods and are harmonized to the extent possible.
Mexico - Living in the streets or public
Japan - Living in the streets or public
